name: ACID Pro 8 Steam Edition
detailed_description:
When it comes to your gaming videos, you're a perfectionist. And with ACID Pro 8 – Steam Edition, you can design the perfect soundtrack for each and every one of them.

The new ACID Pro 8 – the creative DAW

ACID Pro 8 is the creative DAW for music producers. The sophisticated new user interface combined with new 64-bit architecture makes ACID Pro 8 an absolute powerhouse for creative music production. With new instruments and effects, plus a massive library of ACIDized loops (a total value of over $1,000), the new version is the right choice for artists who have their sights set on something big.

More instruments. More sounds. More effects.

Access a formidable collection of 16 instruments – including the DN-e1 analog synthesizer and the Vita Sampler. 13 bonus effects: From the Analogue Modelling Suite to guitar effects by Vandal. Plus a new library with 9 GB of ACIDized loops.

Highlights

  • NEW! A new and modern program interface.
  • NEW! Powerful 64-bit technology
  • Easily record on multiple tracks simultaneously
  • Loop-based music production
  • NEW! A total of 9 GB of ACIDized Loops
  • NEW! A whole range of plug-in instruments and effects
  • Record, play, edit and mix music
  • Comprehensive MIDI support and remixing tools

short_description: Gameplay videos with breathtaking soundtracks: No other DAW enables you to create audio for gaming videos like ACID Pro 8 – Steam Edition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, min. resolution 1024 x 768
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Hard drive space: 500 MB for program installation, 12 GB for included instruments and loops
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz (multicore or multiprocessor recommended)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
